# Government Tender Announcement: Emissions Reduction Fund Onshore Program
### Contract Title: Greenhouse Gas Accounting Methodology and Regulatory Additionality Review
### Reference:  PW-22-01017283
### Solicitation: NRCan-5000071497

### Tender Description

The Government of Canada, represented by Natural Resources Canada (NRCan), invites qualified Service Providers to submit proposals for the validation of their Emissions Reduction Fund Onshore Program's Greenhouse Gas (GHG) quantification methodologies and the calculation of Additional Emission Reductions for Intakes 1, 2, and 3. The successful Service Provider will be required to work closely with the Program team to evaluate the GHG quantification methodologies and project emissions data.

### Conditions for Participation

To participate in this tender, vendors must meet the following requirements:

* Be ISO Standard (14064-1, 2, 3, or equivalent) certified GHG verifier Service Providers
* Demonstrate a thorough understanding of the Emissions Reduction Fund Onshore Program's requirements and GHG quantification methodologies

### Contract Requirements

The Service Provider will be required to:

* Validate the Emissions Reduction Fund Onshore Program's GHG quantification methodologies
* Validate the Program's calculation of Additional Emission Reductions for Intakes 1, 2, and 3
* Work closely with the Program team to evaluate the GHG quantification methodologies and project emissions data

### Security Requirements

This tender includes security requirements. For additional information, vendors should consult Part 6 - Security, Financial and Other Requirements, and Part 7 - Resulting Contract Clauses.

### Contract Timeline

* Award to: June 30, 2023

### How to Apply

Interested vendors can find additional information and the tender documentation at [Canada Buys](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/11/2737b2fcfac542760357c90e7c32b438/nrcan-5000071497_-_amendment_1_-_en.pdf) and [Canada Buys (French)](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/11/f152e75b8f79b06846560dceeb4f7e24/rncan-5000071497_-_amendment_1_-_fr.pdf).
